whom.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the object form of ‘who’, used especially in formal speech or writing
whom.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Desperate for money, she called her sister, whom she hadn’t spoken to in 20 years.
She brought with her three friends, none of whom I had ever met before.
whom.translation[0].definitions[0].note_: In everyday spoken or written English, people usually use who rather than whom:
Who did you send it to?
